mapper.sql: id, title, sell_point, price, image, category_name, item_desc
mapper.select: SELECT ti.id, ti.title, ti.sell_point, ti.price, ti.image, tc.`name` as category_name, td.item_desc from tb_item ti LEFT JOIN tb_item_desc td on ti.id = td.item_id LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat tc on ti.cid = tc.id

SELECT ti.id, ti.title, ti.sell_point, ti.price, ti.image, tc.`name` as category_name, td.item_desc from tb_item ti LEFT JOIN tb_item_desc td on ti.id = td.item_id LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat tc on ti.cid = tc.id where ti.id = #{id}
